name: Rock 'n Load
description:
A mysterious treasure map has led you in the middle of a desert. Find out what secrets this desert holds.

Experience rhythm based gun-play and dance to the tunes of the old west where every gun makes its own tune.

Tips for surviving the Hard Rock

- Keep moving and dodging
- You can press E to use some treasures after digging them up. See what they can do for you.

Made for Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck in a loop
